member.name: DML_ELEMENT_WISE_IS_NAN_OPERATOR_DESC
member.summary: For each element of the input tensor, returns 1 if the input is NaN (as defined by IEEE-754), and 0 otherwise. The result is placed into the corresponding element of the output tensor.

member.name: DML_ELEMENT_WISE_IS_NAN_OPERATOR_DESC.InputTensor
member.summary: The input tensor to read from.

member.name: DML_ELEMENT_WISE_IS_NAN_OPERATOR_DESC.OutputTensor
member.summary: The output tensor to write the results to.
